means: 玛格丽特（女子名， Margaret 的异体）

sentence.Network_en: When I stepped into her box, Marguerite was laughing uproariously.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我走进包厢的时候, 玛格丽特放声大笑.

sentence.Network_en: And in spite of myself , I lamented the fate of Marguerite Gautier.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不由自主地对玛格丽特的命运产生了怜悯的心情.

sentence.Network_en: Marguerite retrieved the bag and, turning round, began chatting to the Duke.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛格丽特拿起那袋蜜饯, 转过身去, 开始和公爵聊天.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: French equivalent of the given name Margaret

means.word_mean: 1. tall leafy-stemmed Eurasian perennial with white flowers; widely naturalized; often placed in genus Chrysanthemum
